author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons were killed and three others sustained grievous injuries when a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation bus and a car collided in Visuvasapuram near Thovalai on Thursday afternoon.

Police sources said that S. Arumugam (55) of Krishnankoil area in Nagercoil and five of his friends were returning from Tirunelveli in a car. When the car tried to overtake another vehicle, it collided with the bus, proceeding to Tiruchendur from Nagercoil.

Arumugam, S. Kalaivanan (35) and N. Murugan (45) died on the spot. Three other occupants of the car – M. Kannan (45), R. Raja (52) and M. Krishnamoorthy (49) – sustained grievous injuries, and were admitted to a nearby private hospital.
title: Three killed as car, bus collide near Thovalai
